item.title: XDK110
item.description: The Bosch Cross Domain Development Kit (XDK) is a programmable sensor device for building IoT applications. It contains a wide range of sensors and means of connectivity, is extensible using its extension bus. Due to its versatility it also serves as reference platform for XDK LIVE. To learn more about the XDK head over to http://xdk.io. Sensor: environment (BME280) Configuration Items Name Description optional power_mode : BME280_PowerMode Defaults to BME280_PowerMode.
